history.text: This looks like an OK movie.
I agree, I think it would be a decent superhero movie. What makes you think it will be OK?
The Rotten Tomatoes score is 92% but the Metacritic score is only 69/100. Do you like the cast?
I like most of the cast, especially Chris Evans. Who is your favorite Avenger?
I would have to say Iron Man based on the Critical Responses. Who is yours?
I would choose the Hulk--I like the description of Banner's "wry reservoir of calm ready to become a volcano"

T
hat is very cool.
Do you like most superhero movies?
No, I really don't like them.
Do you agree with the ratings of this movie?
I would have to see the Metacritic scores in depth, but based on the Critical Responses that Metacritic score seems low. Do you like the key scene?
It's not my favorite scene, and I wish Nick Fury could have stopped Loki from taking the Tessaract. What do you think?
I think the wormhole was key to the whole movie.
What made the wormhole key to the whole movie?
Without the wormhole being activated by the Tesseract Loki couldn't have reached Earth. What do you think of Robert Downey Jr. as Tony Stark / Ironman?
I don't agree with the reviewer that "Iron Man is certainly a team player;" but I do like Robert Downey Jr. in the role. What do you think?
He is a character of established sophistication, as the critical response says. The whole movie was well-cast, what do you think?
I agree that it was well cast. What do you think about the second key scene?
I think the death of Coulson really brought the whole Avengers together, how about you?
I agree, it was sad to see the Avengers divided first but I'm glad they ended up working together.
Me too! I'm so glad they got together by the end of the movie.
What do you think of Joss Wheedon's directing?
He really did get all those personalities to blend well, that's such a good sight to see. He really did a justice to this movie.
I agree. What was your favorite part of the third key scene?

Thankfully the Hulk saved Stark from crashing into the ground
. Was this the most important event in that scene to you?
I think it's also important that the Hulk neutralized Loki
Why is that?
It freed Selvig from Loki's mind control and helped the Avengers realize his scepter could shut down the generator
